quotes.author: Sean McVay
quotes.quote: I love being in a city with great weather.

quotes.author: Frank Lane
quotes.quote: If you want to see the sunshine, you have to weather the storm.

quotes.author: Ravyn Lenae
quotes.quote: I'm not a fan of cold weather.

quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner
quotes.quote: Everybody talks about the weather, but nobody does anything about it.
